title: Multimedia-Based Mathematics Learning Design: Effective Presentation Production Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental mathematical concepts and smartphone-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals with novice-level mathematical expertise, participating in smartphone-centric, technology-constrained learning settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more PowerPoint slide design strategies based on multimedia learning principles.
Learners can produce math concept visualization materials applying cognitive load theory.
Learners can design and implement interactive quiz elements optimized for mobile environments into an LMS two or more times.
Learners can execute a feedback routine that improves slide content by over 80% based on formative assessment results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
